original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 328.75/80 to US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 328.75/80 to the US dollar on Thursday, from 328.50/65 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 14.20/35 percent from 13.90/14.25 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 14.35/50 percent from 13.30/14.40 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 14.55/60 percent from 14.35/14.55 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.60/80 percent from 14.45/14.65 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.40/50 percent, up from 14.30/14.55 percent. (Colombo/Nov23/2023)
